org.gvsig.tools.persistence

Interface PersistenceFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentManager, LayoutManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDocumentManager, AbstractMultiPersistenceFactory, AbstractSinglePersistenceFactory, ChartDocumentManager, ColorPersistenceFactory, CoordTransPersistenceFactory, DefaultLayoutManager, DimensionPersistenceFactory, DynObjectPersistenceFactory, FontPersistenceFactory, GeometryPersistenceFactory, GeometryPersistenceFactory, GeometryTypePersistenceFactory, GeometryTypePersistenceFactory, JavaTextFactory, MapserverAlignEnumPersistenceFactory, MapserverBigIntegerPersistenceFactory, MapserverBooleanEnumPersistenceFactory, MapserverClassPersistenceFactory, MapserverColorPersistenceFactory, MapserverExpressionTypePersistenceFactory, MapserverLabelPersistenceFactory, MapserverLayerPersistenceFactory, MapserverMapPersistenceFactory, MapserverOutputFormatPersistenceFactory, MapserverPointsPersistenceFactory, MapserverPointTypePersistenceFactory, MapserverSizeTypePersistenceFactory, MapserverStylePersistenceFactory, MapserverSymbolPersistenceFactory, MapserverSymbolSetPersistenceFactory, MapserverSymbolTypePersistenceFactory, MapserverWebPersistenceFactory, MapSheetsProjectMapFactory, Point2DPersistenceFactory, PortableViewDocumentManager, ProjectionPersistenceFactory, RasterStorePersistenceFactory, Rectangle2DPersistenceFactory, SimplePersistenceFactory, TableManager, TinyOWSLayerPersistenceFactory, TinyOWSPersistenceFactory, ViewManager

    public interface PersistenceFactory

    Interface for factories of objects that no implements Persistent and must be supported by PersistenceManager.

    This can be used when the objects to persist can't be created by empty constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • createFromState

        Object createFromState(PersistentState state)
                throws PersistenceException
        Create an instance of the object represented by the state. This method can't call loadFromState(PersistentState, Object) only create the object.
        Parameters:
        state -
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        PersistenceException

        object -
        Throws:
        PersistenceException

        Informs if object is managed by this factory.

      • getDefinition

        DynStruct getDefinition(String className)
        Returns the associated definition to the java class name
        Parameters:
        className - of a java Class
        Returns:
        the related definition or null if not managed by this factory

      • getDomainName

        String getDomainName()
        Returns the domain name of the objects persisted by this factory.
        Returns:

        String getDomainURL()
        Returns the domain URL to use for the schema.
        Returns:
        the domain URL

      • getManagedClasses

        List getManagedClasses()
        Return the list of classes or interfaces managed by this factory. Can return null if factory not use it.
        Returns:
        List of interfaces the factory manage

      • getManagedClass

        Class getManagedClass(Object object)
        Return the class or interface the factory asociate to the object. Can return null if factory not asociate an interface to the object.
        Parameters:
        object -
        Returns:
        interface the factory manage asociated to the object.

      • getManagedClassName

        String getManagedClassName(Object object)
        Return the name class or interface the factory asociate to the object. Can return null if factory not asociate an interface to the object.
        Parameters:
        object -
        Returns:
        interface the factory manage asociated to the object.

      • getManagedClass

        Class getManagedClass(PersistentState state)
        Return the class or interface the factory asociate to the object. Can return null if factory not asociate an interface to the object.
        Parameters:
        state -
        Returns:
        interface or class the factory manage asociated to the state.

      • getManagedClass

        Class getManagedClass(String name)
        Return the class or interface the factory asociate to the java class name. Can return null if factory not asociate an interface to that name.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        interface or class the factory manage asociated to the name.
